description.full: Four Action-Packed Hits on One Disc! Get hours of all-out action-strategy fun with these hit titles from PopCap, the Number 1 creator of casual games.  PLANTS VS ZOMBIES - Get ready to soil your plants… with multiplayer action! ZUMA - Be quick or be history to survive the temples of Zuma! HEAVY WEAPON - It’s shoot ‘em-up arcade action at its best! FEEDING FRENZY 2 - Sink your teeth into fun as you chomp your way to victory!
